summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department; authorizing a 10-year agreement with Pend Oreille County for (1) the loss of revenues and additional financial burdens associated with the City of Seattle's operation of the Boundary Hydroelectric Project on the Pend Oreille River pursuant to RCW 35.21.420, .425, .426, and .427, and (2) the County's agreement to settle all issues relating to City Light's relicensing of the Boundary Hydroelectric Project and the related Sullivan Creek Power Project license surrender.
